Is it possible to apply a crawling strategy based OPIC algorithm to a Herit=
rix 3.x crawl?

We initially though that we could use the URI precedence, b=
ut it appears that there isn't any provision for a URI's precedence to chan=
ge after initial assignment and as stated here http://tech.groups.yahoo.com=
/group/archive-crawler/message/6022  by Gordon, depending on how they are q=
ueued, they could be crawled out of order.

Can anyone share some insight o=
n this?

--David
